articles.title: Niger junta says ‘high treason’ evidence gathered to prosecute ousted president Bazoum - CNN
articles.description: Niger’s junta claimed Sunday it had gathered evidence to prosecute the country’s ousted President Mohamed Bazoum for “high treason,” upping the stakes in their brinkmanship against key neighbors in West Africa who have vowed to restore constitutional order in…
